attributes.action: We need a bank holiday for schools on monday. We want to watch the england match
attributes.background: We need the bank holiday a lot of people can’t watch england play at 8 as they need to go to school and work so on Monday a bank hoilday is required

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Bank Holiday Monday if England get to the finals of the Euro’s 2020
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590584
